norepinephrine.name: Norepinephrine
norepinephrine.notes: Prefer central line. Titrate to MAP.
guided_steps: Select ampoule strength available (4 mg or 8 mg).
Choose dilution volume (50 ml preferred for titration).
Calculate infusion and set pump accordingly.
Ask second nurse to verify the prepared infusion.

insulin_regular.name: Insulin (Regular)
insulin_regular.notes: Follow hypoglycemia protocol. Double-check bedside measurements.
guided_steps: Confirm blood glucose and indication for infusion.
Document start time and bedside glucose checks every 1 hour.

nitroglycerin.name: Nitroglycerin (TNG)
nitroglycerin.notes: Watch for hypotension and headache. Protect from light.
guided_steps: Select which ampoule is available (5mg preferred).
Choose dilution (50 ml syringe or 100 ml microset).
Enter target infusion in mcg/min (e.g., 50 mcg/min).
Calculator will show how many ampoules to add and pump rate.
